alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 10:31PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Koochiching County through 1115 PM CDT... At 1031 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Williams, to 13 miles north of Upper Red Lake, to Lower Red Lake, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Koochiching County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for north central Minnesota.
